articles.author: Christian Shepherd
articles.title: China tries to use Trump turmoil to unite leaders against U.S.-led order - The Washington Post
articles.description: Twenty leaders — including from Russia, Iran and India — will gather for a forum, part of Beijing’s efforts to be seen as a reliable counterweight to the U.S.
articles.content:
Twenty leaders including from Russia, Iran and India will gather for a forum, part of Beijings efforts to be seen as a reliable counterweight to the U.S.
